Description: Pottery bowl made from coarse straw tempered Nile silt with many white inclusions, with flaring walls, everted rim.
Curator's comments: Bibliography for excavations: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911). Marked H8 (B) on base, but bowl is not mentioned in text for this grave. Like Rough ware R26a in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric pottery.
